name: Travel Bonsai Garden
description:
Designed for ProcJam 2014, the Travel Bonsai Garden is a prototype by Binary Gambit.

Sculpt your procedural generated tree in a digital masterpiece.

Features: Unlimited Trees Keep generating until you find a tree you like Prune and Cut Change the shape by pruning and regrowing branches, or just remove them wholesale Relaxment Play a little piano music while your bonsai grows, it will help a lot! Color Schemes Need more Zen? Choose from one of our minimalist color schemes Seasonal Change 1.5 seasons to enjoy. Winter and everything else. Like it?

You can provide feedback to us on Twitter @BinaryGambit or

Like all Binary Gambit Prototypes, if this game recieves enough interest it will be remade for Windows, Linux, Mac and Android using the Love2d framework.
